text: Cyborg (Victor "Vic" Stone) is a fictional comic book superhero. He first appeared in the DC Comics universe. He is best known for being a member of the Teen Titans. == Fictional character biography == He is an African American. He is part human and part cyborg (robot). == In other media == He is currently voiced by Khary Payton in the DC franchise and by Kenn Michael in the feature movies and direct-to-video movies. In the DC Extended Universe movies, the character is played by actor Ray Fisher. Category:DC Comics superheroes
title: Cyborg (DC Comics)
